item.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
item.description: Today we are looking at text data from the scripts for the TV show ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’. I decided to see if certain characters that dominate a show affect the ratings in a postive or negative way. I am only going to use word count, as that’s all I have, but it would be interesting to incorporate screen time as well. Below I walk through counting words per each episode, counting words per each character per episode, and then capturing that percentage.
